backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, game stats, and in‑progress runs with permission-checked queries and updates using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI/control updates to affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence flags.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all frontend files, including game screens, controls, hooks, and styles.
frontend/docs/IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md: High-level implementation guide outlining the structure and technology stack of the Space Shooter game.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layer defining root color tokens, dark mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component controlling menu/game state transitions, high score syncing, and resume-data handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button with status handling, error recovery, and neon-themed styling.
frontend/src/components/RotateDeviceOver: Overlay prompting users to rotate to landscape mode, with safe-area padding and neon visuals.
frontend/src/game/controls/Joystick.tsx: Touch/mouse joystick control implementing drag-based movement, clamped radius logic, and full event cleanup on orientation and visibility changes.
frontend/src/game/controls/ShootButton.t: Touch and mouse event-driven shoot button that triggers start and stop shooting states.
frontend/src/game/controls/useCombinedCo: Merges keyboard, joystick, and touch shooting inputs into a single movement and shooting control state.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardCo: Tracks WASD/arrow keys and spacebar to produce movement and shooting control values.
frontend/src/game/persistence/inProgress: Handles saving, loading, version-checking, and clearing in-progress run data from localStorage.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useInProgr: Manages loading, saving, and clearing in-progress runs using localStorage and backend sync via React Query.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useSavedSt: Loads and saves persistent player stats through the backend using React Query mutations.
Draws a detailed vector-based player ship with gradients, glow effects, and highlights.
frontend/src/game/render/GameCanvas.tsx: Canvas renderer that sizes the canvas and draws the playfield, player, bullets, and other game elements.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines shared game types including player, bullets, enemies, explosions, sparks, and overall game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/Hud.tsx: UI component rendering game HUD elements like score, timer, level, pause, and boss progress with dynamic styling and formatting.
frontend/src/game/ui/TouchControlsDebugO: Displays debug information for touch-control detection, visibility logic, and input state.
frontend/src/game/useGameEngine.ts: Custom hook implementing the core game loop, state management, entity updates, timers, and resume logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDynamicViewport.ts: Tracks visual viewport changes and updates a CSS variable for stable mobile viewport height.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and identity persistence handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsTouchCapable.ts: Detects touch-capable devices using multiple signals and updates on relevant events.
frontend/src/hooks/useLandscapeOrientati: Tracks mobile orientation state and provides helpers to lock or unlock landscape mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating queries are defined elsewhere.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers with OKLCH theme variables, responsive sizing tokens, and custom glass-card utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity context, importing global styles.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Implements the main gameplay screen, wiring controls, orientation handling, autosave, and rendering the canvas, HUD, and touch controls.
frontend/src/screens/MenuScreen.tsx: Renders the animated menu with logo, title, high score card, and start/continue buttons using themed styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, and persist URL parameters including boolean parsing and session fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with OKLCH-based colors, neon effects, animations, and custom utilities matching the app’s theme.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including touch-control feature requirements and metadata.
